page.title: 24Castle Museum
page.content:
Tamworth Castle has come along massively in recent years. Now opening Tuesday to Sunday 11:30 until last admission at 4:30. Adults pay £6.50 and children over 5 pay £4.00, concessionary prices also available. Recently playing host to the Staffordshire Hoard - the largest saxon hoard found to date. The castle also host many events such as Murder Mysteries, ghost hunts and living history days. The great hall can be booked for wedding and civil ceremonies. School groups also visit the castle and the educational team have just been awarded the Heritage Education Trust Sandford Award.
J Balchin
